Posts.Content: May 28, 2008 01:52PM OptimisticWorrier wrote: It helps so much to hear that breast infections not related to breastfeeding DO indeed happen!!!  Thanks so much!  Folks here at this site are so kind and helpful.  Don't know what I would do without this resource!?!  (go a little crazy probably)
